title: posit::conf(2025) workshops
text:
Workshop
Instructor(s)




Branded Websites, Presentations, Dashboards, and PDFs with Quarto
Isabella Velasquez, Sara Altman


Causal Inference in R
Malcolm Barrett, Lucy D'Agostino McGowan


Data Science Workflows with Posit Tools - R Focus
Sam Edwardes, Ryan Johnson


Data Talks: How to make your data science accessible
Acacia Duncan, Blythe Coons


Deploying reproducible analytics environments for regulated use cases
James Black, Doug Kelkhoff, Michael Mayer, Rafael Pereira


End-to-End Submissions in R with the Pharmaverse
Daniel D. Sjoberg, Becca Krouse, Ben Straub, Rammprasad Ganapathy


Extending Quarto
Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel, Charlotte Wickham


From R User to R Programmer
Emma Rand, Ian Lyttle


Getting More Out of Feature Engineering and Tuning for Machine Learning
Max Kuhn, Emil Hvitfeldt


Introduction to machine learning in R with tidymodels
Simon Couch


Machine learning with scikit-learn in Python
Tiffany Timbers, Katie Burak


Mastering Data Visualization with ggplot2: Latest Techniques and Best Practices
Thomas Pedersen, Teun Van den Brand


Package Development: The Rest of the Owl
Jenny Bryan


Programming with LLM APIs: A Beginner’s Guide in R and Python
Joe Cheng, Garrick Aden-Buie


R in Production
Hadley Wickham


Shiny for Python
Daniel Chen


Shiny for R
Colin Rundel
